properties.displayName: Potential Windows Defender Tampering Via Wmic.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "/Namespace:\\\\root\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Defender" and (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "wmic.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\WMIC.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects potential tampering with Windows Defender settings such as adding exclusion using w
